name: Populous II: Trials of the Olympian Gods
overview: The gods are back, and all Hell is about to break loose! As the offspring of almighty Zeus, you demand a seat among the gods. But before ascending Mt. Olympus, you must defeat 32 of Zeus' most powerful deities. Learn to shatter the sky with lightning and shower the earth with fire. Summon heroes to aid your people and plagues to destroy the enemy. Call forth tornadoes, hurricanes, tidal waves and columns of flame. A challenging task for a god... a monumental task for a mortal!
